text: Nyan keuh haba nyan nyang Kamoe kisah Hujah Kamoe bri akan Ibrahim Jeut gopnyan yakin hana peue peugah Alasan kawom geuh ek geutulak Soe nyang meukheundak Kamoe bri hujah Soe nyang meukheundak Kamoe bri pangkat Meubri deurajat manyang that leupah Bit Tuhan gata that bijaksana Han ek takira â€˜eleumee luah
